script.title: add-psod-filter.slax
script.author: mcdoug62
script.synopsis: create and apply "anti-ping-sweep-of-death" filters to IPv6 interfaces having prefix len of /64 or shorter
script.description: Script allows user to specify one or more interfaces to create and apply 'anti-psod' firewall filters to. User must only speciy one of the following: 1. a single interface and unit, 2. ALL interfaces (and all units), 3. ONLY interfaces matching a certain string or 4. all interfaces EXCEPT those matching a certain string.
